sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { useSimulatorStore } from '../store/simulatorStore'; interface MemoryEntry { label: string; address: number; value: number; hex: string; } const RegisterMemoryViewer: React.FC = () => { const { cpu } = useSimulatorStore(); // Create memory display with addresses D0-D31 and S0-S31 const createMemorySection = (prefix: string, startIndex: number, color: string) => { const entries: MemoryEntry[] = []; for (let i = 0; i < 32; i++) { const address = startIndex + i; const value = cpu.dataMemory.get(address) || 0; entries.push({ label: `${prefix}${i}`, address, value, hex: `0x${value.toString(16).toUpperCase().padStart(8, '0')}`, }); } return { entries, color }; }; const dataMemory = createMemorySection('D', 0, 'bg-blue-50'); const stackMemory = createMemorySection('S', 32, 'bg-green-50'); return (

Registers & Memory State

{/* Program Counter */}

Program Counter

PC 0x{cpu.pc.toString(16).toUpperCase().padStart(8, '0')}
{/* General Purpose Registers X0-X15 */}

Registers X0-X15

{cpu.registers.slice(0, 16).map((value, index) => (
X{index} 0x{value.toString(16).toUpperCase().padStart(8, '0')}
))}
{/* General Purpose Registers X16-X31 */}

Registers X16-X31

{cpu.registers.slice(16, 32).map((value, index) => (
X{index + 16} 0x{value.toString(16).toUpperCase().padStart(8, '0')}
))} {/* Special Registers */}
SP 0x{(0x80000000).toString(16).toUpperCase().padStart(8, '0')}
FP 0x0
LR 0x0
XZR 0x0
{/* Flags */}

Processor Flags

Z {cpu.flags.zero ? '1' : '0'}
N {cpu.flags.negative ? '1' : '0'}
C {cpu.flags.carry ? '1' : '0'}
V {cpu.flags.overflow ? '1' : '0'}
{/* Data Memory D0-D31 */}

Data Memory (D0-D31)

{dataMemory.entries.map((entry, index) => (
{entry.label} {entry.hex}
))}
{/* Stack Memory S0-S31 */}

Stack Memory (S0-S31)

{stackMemory.entries.map((entry, index) => (
{entry.label} {entry.hex}
))}
{/* Current Instruction Display */} {cpu.currentInstruction && (

Current Instruction

{cpu.currentInstruction.assembly} PC: 0x{cpu.pc.toString(16).toUpperCase().padStart(8, '0')}
)}
); }; export default RegisterMemoryViewer;
